src:
Bo nekdanji Časarjevi ženi uspelo hiši obvarovati pred Luko?
06 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Sijan Pretnar

Nekdanja zakonca Časar v prihodnjih dneh oziroma tednih pričakujeta dve sodni pošiljki. V ponedeljek je sodnica Darja Morelj ocenila, da je zadeva v primeru druge tožbe Ksenije Sedmak proti Luki Koper zrela za odločitev, enako je v podobni pravdi pred nekaj tedni odločila tudi druga sodnica ...



Časar je na sodišču potrdil trditve bivše žene. “Vlagala je ona, hotela se je preseliti v Portorož,” je povedal in dodal, da so hišo povečali za 146 kvadratnih metrov. Zatrdil je še, da je bivša žena vodila tudi postopek pridobitve gradbenega dovoljenja. Foto: Danijel Cek

KOPER > V ponedeljek je nekdanji predsednik uprave Luke Koper Robert Časar znova pojasnjeval, kako sta se z ženo Ksenijo Sedmak razšla in kdo ...
Celotna vsebina je na voljo le naročnikom.

Will ex-Casar's wife keep the house safe from Luke?
06 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Sijan Pretnar

Former Chasar spouses expect two shipments in the coming days or weeks. On Monday, Judge Darja Morelj assessed that the case in the case of Ksenija Sedmak's second lawsuit against Luka Koper was ripe for a decision, the same in a similar case a few weeks ago by another judge ...



The watchmaker confirmed the ex-wife's claims in court. "She was investing, she wanted to move to Portorož," he said, adding that the house had been enlarged by 146 square meters. He also claimed that his ex-wife also conducted the building permit process. Photo: Daniel Cek

KOPER> Former Luka Koper CEO Robert Casar reiterated on Monday how he and his wife, Ksenija Sedmak, split up and who ...
